backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles, access control, label settings, and print job submission with serial-duplication checks and per‑user mappings.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing affected frontend files, components, and test IDs for two Scan & Print workflow improvements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to concise summaries describing each module's purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining light/dark theme CSS variables and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wiring password session handling, error boundaries, and conditional rendering of LockScreen or AppShell.
frontend/src/audio/soundSystem.ts: Zustand-backed sound settings store with Web Audio API beep generation and helpers for playing success, error, and print-complete sounds.
frontend/src/auth/passwordSession.ts: LocalStorage-backed password session utilities handling creation, validation, expiry, and password checking.
frontend/src/auth/PasswordSessionProvide: React context managing password session lifecycle with unlock/lock functions and session rehydration.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Main layout component providing header, tab navigation, and page structure for scan, settings, devices, and diagnostics tabs.
frontend/src/components/BackendAvailabil: Displays a warning badge when the backend is unavailable using state from backendAvailabilityStore.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that catches runtime errors and renders a fallback UI with a refresh option.
frontend/src/components/HeaderDeviceCont: Shows printer connection status and a wake-lock toggle using printerService and useWakeLock.
frontend/src/components/SerialTypeCounte: Renders print counters per label type based on diagnostics and label settings, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/config/lockScreenConfig.ts: Provides the expected lock-screen password, allowing build-time override via VITE_LOCK_PASSWORD.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for authentication, login, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Custom hooks for print job mutations and history queries with backend availability handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Manages screen wake lock state with persistence and automatic re-request on visibility changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining theme variables, dark mode, and accessibility-focused UI rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point wiring React, Internet Identity provider, React Query client, and global styles.
frontend/src/printing/barcodePreview.ts: Creates simple deterministic barcode SVGs by converting input text into patterned bar widths.
frontend/src/printing/cpclGenerator.ts: Builds CPCL command strings for test prints and dynamic labels using layout settings and serial numbers.
frontend/src/printing/LabelPreview.tsx: Renders an interactive preview of a label layout with zoom controls and sample serial inputs, generating barcode SVGs based on settings.
frontend/src/screens/LockScreen.tsx: Displays a password entry screen that unlocks the app and handles validation, focus, and error feedback.
frontend/src/screens/PasswordSessionWiri: Shows a configuration error message with troubleshooting steps and a refresh button.
frontend/src/services/printerService.ts: Manages printer connection state and sending CPCL data over USB or simulated Bluetooth via a Zustand store.
frontend/src/services/usbCpclTransport.t: Implements WebUSB-based printer discovery, connection, and data transfer for CPCL printers.
frontend/src/state/backendAvailabilitySt: Zustand store tracking backend availability with timestamps and error state management.
frontend/src/state/diagnosticsStore.ts: Zustand store tracking scans, prints, errors, and per-type counters with persistent storage and helper increment functions.
frontend/src/state/labelSettingsStore.ts: Persistent Zustand store for label settings with BigInt-safe storage, default layouts, and migration from old formats.
frontend/src/state/logStore.ts: Persistent log store storing up to 500 timestamped log entries with simple add-log functionality.
frontend/src/state/printHistoryStore.ts: Persistent print history store keeping the last 1000 print entries and providing a reprint helper using the printer service.
frontend/src/tabs/DevicesTab.tsx: UI for connecting to a printer via Bluetooth or USB, showing connection status and providing a test print option.
frontend/src/tabs/DiagnosticsTab.tsx: Diagnostics UI showing scan/print stats, history with reprint, logs with filtering, and sound settings controls.
frontend/src/tabs/LabelSettingsTab.tsx: UI for editing, importing, exporting, and previewing label layout settings with support for prefix mappings and custom types.
frontend/src/tabs/ScanPrintTab.tsx: React tab handling two-step serial scanning, prefix detection, validation, and print job submission with printer and state integrations.
frontend/src/utils/icErrors.ts: Utilities to detect IC canister-stopped errors and return a user-friendly message.
frontend/src/utils/labelSettingsErrors.t: Parses errors from label settings updates and maps them to clear user-facing messages.
frontend/src/utils/labelSettingsImportEx: Handles exporting label settings with BigInt support and importing/migrating old or new settings formats with validation.
frontend/src/utils/labelTypes.ts: Defines built‑in and custom label types and utilities for naming, extraction, and aggregation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, layout, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current build state, including high‑level goals, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features for an Android tablet barcode/label printing app using React/TypeScript and a Motoko backend.
